Strength: 20 (+5) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)

Feature Notes:

Armor Proficiency: Armor Trained (Light Armor)
Clever Improviser: Has Untrained Improvisation feature
Fighter Expertise: Class Expert (Fighter)
Fighter Feats: 11 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Ancestral Paragon: FILL
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Gnome Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Halfling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Astral Plane Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +26 (charisma; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +31 (strength; master) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Midwifery Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Milling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Taldan History Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Demon Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mining Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tea Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)

Skill Training (Troll Lore): Skill Trained (Troll Lore)
Assurance (Plains Lore): May take 10 on Plains Lore rolls
Assurance (Survival): May take 10 on Survival rolls
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Expeditious Search: May Search at 2x normal speed
Group Coercion: May use Intimidation to Coerce 2 targets
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 37 (dexterity; master) Class DC: Fighter: 41 (strength; master)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Armor Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Armor Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Incredible Initiative: +2 Initiative
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Versatile Legend: Weapon Legendary (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Weapon Master (Advanced Weapons)/Class Master (Fighter)
Weapon Legend: Weapon Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)/Weapon Expert (Advanced Weapons)
Advanced Weapon Training: Has proficiency with advanced weapons in chosen group equal to martial weapons
Advantageous Assault: Strike on grabbed, prone, or restrained foe inflicts +damage dice HP damage (+damage dice + 2 HP if wielded two-handed), even on failure
Aggressive Block: May use Shield Block to move foe 5' or cause it to become flat-footed (foe's choice)
Agile Grace: Reduces multi-attack penalty with agile weapons to -3/-6
Armor Expertise: May use the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Assisting Shot: Successful ranged Strike gives next ally attack on foe +1 attack (critical success +2)
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Battlefield Surveyor: +2 Perception for Initiative
Blind-Fight: May attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 check/Does not suffer flat-footed with hidden foes
Boundless Reprisals: May use an additional Reaction to use a fighter feat or class feature 1/foe turn
Brutal Finish: May end turn with a two-handed Strike that inflicts +2 damage dice, even on a failure
Brutish Shove: Two-handed Strike inflicts flat-footed until end of turn; success allows subsequent Shove
Certain Strike: Failed Strikes inflict normal damage other than damage dice
Combat Flexibility: May use chosen fighter feat of up to 8th level and chosen fighter feat of up to 14th level each dy
Combat Grab: Successful Strike allows grabbing foe with free hand for 1 rd or until foe Escapes
Combat Reflexes: May use an additional Reaction to make an Attack Of Opportunity 1/tn
Debilitating Shot: May use 2 actions to make a ranged attack that slows target for 1 rd
Desperate Finisher: May use a press action as a Reaction, foregoing any further Reactions this turn
Disarming Stance: Stance gives +1 to Disarm and +2 vs. Disarm when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free and allows Disarming foes two sizes larger
Disarming Twist: A successful Strike with a one-handed melee weapon and the other hand free inflicts Disarm; failure inflicts flat-footed until the end of tn
Disruptive Stance: Stance allows Attack Of Opportunity in response to a concentrate action; any successful Strike disrupts
Double Shot: May make two ranged Strikes against two foes, suffering a -2 attack penalty on each
Double Slice: May attack with two weapons simultaneously
Dual-Handed Assault: Increases damage from 2-handed weapon by number of damage dice and other weapon by one step
Dueling Dance: Stance gives +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Dueling Parry: +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Dueling Riposte: May use a Reaction to Strike or Disarm a foe who critically fails an attack on self
Exacting Strike: Failed attack does not count toward multi-attack penalty
Fearsome Brute: Strikes against frightened foes inflict +frighted value x 2 HP damage
Felling Strike: May use 2 actions to attack a flying foe; a successful Strike causes it to fall 120', and a critical hit grounds it for 1 rd
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Weapon Master with common weapons and Weapon Expert with advanced weapons of chosen group/May use critical specialization effects of all weapons with master proficiency
Flinging Shove: Aggressive Block moves foe 10' (critical success 20') or inflicts flat-footed; Brutish Shove moves foe 10' (failure 5', critical success 20')
Furious Focus: Two-handed power attacks count as single attacks for multi-attack penalty
Graceful Poise: Stance allows Double Slice with an agile weapon to count as one attack
Guardian's Deflection: May use Reaction to give adjacent ally +2 AC
Guiding Finish: May move target 10' within reach with a successful Strike (failure 5') when wielding a one-handed weapon with a hand free
Guiding Riposte: May move target 10' within reach with a successful Dueling Riposte Strike
Impossible Volley: May use 3 actions to make a -2 ranged Strike against all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Dueling Riposte: May use an additional Reaction to make a Dueling Riposte 1/tn
Improved Flexibility: Increased Combat Flexibility effects
Improved Knockdown: May use Knockdown without a Trip check
Improved Reflexive Shield: May use Shield Block to protect both self and adjacent allies
Improved Twin Riposte: May use an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte 1/tn
Incredible Aim: May use 2 actions to gain +2 on a ranged attack that ignores concealment
Incredible Improvisation: May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/dy
Incredible Ricochet: Second ranged attack in turn against the same foe ignores concealment and cover
Intimidating Strike: Successful Strike inflicts frightened 1 (critical hit frightened 2)
Knockdown: May follow a successful Strike with an Athletics check to Trip
Lunge: May make a +5' Strike
Lunging Stance: Stance gives +5' reach on Attacks Of Opportunity
Mirror Shield: May use a Reaction to reflect a spell back upon caster with a ranged Strike or spell attack
Mobile Shot Stance: Stance negates Reactions from Ranged Strikes and allows Attack Of Opportunity with a loaded ranged weapon on an adjacent creature
Multishot Stance: Stance reduces Double Shot/Triple Shot penalty to -1/-2
Paragon's Guard: Stance gives continuous benefits of Raise a Shield
Point-Blank Shot: Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Positioning Assault: May use 2 actions to move target 5' to within reach with a successful Strike
Power Attack: May use 2 actions for a melee Strike that inflicts 3 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multi-attack penalty
Powerful Shove: May use Aggressive Block and Brutish Shove on foes two sizes larger/Shoved creatures take 5 damage from hitting an object
Quick Reversal: May use an attack to Strike two flanking foes
Quick Shield Block: May use an additional Reaction for a Shield Block 1/tn
Reactive Shield: May use Reaction to make a Raise a Shield action
Revealing Stab: May leave a piercing weapon embedded in a corporeal concealed or hidden foe to reveal it to others
Savage Critical: Successful rolls of 19 with a legendary weapon are critical successes
Shatter Defenses: A successful Strike vs. a frightened foe inflicts flat-footed while frightened condition lasts
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Shield Warden: May use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Shielded Stride: May Stride with shield raised at half Speed without triggering Reactions
Snagging Strike: Successful Strike inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd
Spring Attack: May Strike a foe after Striding away from another
Stance Savant: May enter a stance during initiative
Sudden Charge: May use 2 actions to make a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: May use 2 actions to make a Strike during a Leap, High Jump, or Long Jump
Swipe: May use two actions to attack two adjacent foes with one Strike
Triple Shot: May use Double Shot against a single foe/May use 2 actions to make three ranged Strikes against a single foe, suffering a -4 attack penalty on each
Twin Parry: May parry with two weapons to gain +1 AC for 1 rd (+2 AC with weapon parry trait)
Twin Riposte: May use a Reaction to Strike or Disarm a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twinned Defense: Stance gives continuous benefits of Twin Parry
Two-Weapon Flurry: May Strike with two weapons simultaneously
Weapon Legend: Weapon Legendary in common weapons and Weapon Master in advanced weapons of chosen group
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Supremacy: Permanently quickened; may use additional actions only to Strike
Whirlwind Strike: May use 3 actions to Strike each foe within reach
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical saves/Reduce value of frightened condition by 1
Determination: May end a nonpermanent spell (level 10 Will save) or condition affecting self 1/dy
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Reflexive Shield: Raised shield adds shield bonus to Reflex saves
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 12 available vs. 74 allocated
